title: Rinar Valeyev
text:
Rinar Valeyev (; born 22 August 1987) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Peremoha%20Dnipro">Peremoha Dnipro</a>.
Career.
He joined Chornomorets during the winter transfer window, in January 2007, on a three-year contract. His debut for Stal Alchevsk came on 23 August 2008 in a 3–1 defeat of <a href="FC%20Knyazha%20Schaslyve">FC Knyazha Schaslyve</a>. He played for <a href="FC%20Illichivets%20Mariupol">Illichivets Mariupol</a>.
His older brother, <a href="Ruslan%20Valeyev">Ruslan Valeyev</a> is also a football player, who played for Chornomorets during the 2007–08 season together with Rinar.
